biography: Anders, a name synonymous with dedication at Vihti Golf Club, has graced the greens of the Hector Trophée on one occasion, showcasing a blend of precision and strategic acumen. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Anders's commitment to the sport remains unwavering.

Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Anders meticulously plans each shot, embodying a calculated risk-taker on the course. Although considered retired from Hector events, his presence is missed by fellow competitors and enthusiasts alike.
Despite not participating in Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility of a surprise return lingers, a testament to Anders's enduring passion for the game.
